trans-unit.source: Draws a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> using the specified <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing.Brush" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing.Pen" />.
trans-unit.target: Disegna un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> utilizzando gli oggetti <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing.Brush" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing.Pen" /> specificati.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> class with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush> to paint an object with a shape, with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage> to create clip art, or with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> classe con un <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush> per disegnare un oggetto con una forma, con un <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage> per creare ClipArt, o con un <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingVisual>.

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features
A <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> è un tipo di <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> dell'oggetto e pertanto può essere bloccato per migliorare le prestazioni.

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni su <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> funzionalità, ad esempio il blocco e la clonazione, vedere il [panoramica sugli oggetti Freezable](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />.

trans-unit.source: The brush used to fill this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />.
The pen used to stroke this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />.
The geometry

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" />, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" />.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" /> con gli oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" />, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> specificati.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> used to fill the interior of the shape described by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> utilizzato per riempire l'area interna della forma descritta dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />.

trans-unit.source: The brush used to fill this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />.
The default value is <see langword="null" />.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing.Brush" /> dependency property.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Crea un clone modificabile di questo oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />, eseguendo copie complete dei valori dell'oggetto.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Durante la copia delle proprietà di dipendenza, questo metodo copia i riferimenti alle risorse e i data binding (che potrebbero non essere più risolti), ma non le animazioni né i relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> dell'oggetto clonato sarà <see langword="false" />, anche se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> dell'oggetto di origine è <see langword="true." />.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Crea un clone modificabile dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />, eseguendo copie complete dei valori correnti di tale oggetto.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: I riferimenti alle risorse, i data binding e le animazioni non vengono copiati, ma vengono copiati i relativi valori correnti.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> dell'oggetto clonato sarà <see langword="false" />, anche se la proprietà <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> dell'oggetto di origine è <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene utilizzato per produrre copie modificabili di bloccata <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetti (o qualsiasi <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> oggetto).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Per comodità, questo metodo nasconde la versione ereditata con un'implementazione fortemente tipizzata.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> that describes the shape of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Geometry" /> che descrive la forma dell'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />.

trans-unit.source: The shape described by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />.
The default value is <see langword="null" />.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing.Geometry" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> used to stroke this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Pen" /> utilizzato per tracciare l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />.

trans-unit.source: The pen used to stroke this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing" />.
The default value is <see langword="null" />.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing.Pen" /> dependency property.
